title: Money Management
description: It's about how and how much you bet on each game. It is a mandatory item to fill out.

title: Teams
description: Choose your favorite teams, or exclude those you don't like.

title: Referees
description: If you suspect biased refereeing, you can exclude all games with some referees. The converse is also true.

title: Goals
description: Anything related to the score of the match. Game score, time of goals scored, number of goals by period and much more.
